title: Secret Meeting
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>….Hanayo, did you bring the goods?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Of course. What about you, Ai-san, did it go well….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Somehow. It was tough bringing it here….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Alright, let’s go there. There’s no one in the clubroom right now, so….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>So delicious~~~~!! Your grandmother’s Nukadzuke really are the best, Ai-san! The rice I brought is going to be gone in no time~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hehhe~, it is, right? Ai’s grandmother’s new Nukadzuke recipe has no match~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Uuh, I can’t stop…. I can’t stop eating….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Come on, here, the asparagus and the avocado are really tasty too, so try them! The ginger and the paprika are also super good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
